short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for products on popular websites via text on screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fast and lightweight browser extension allowing users to quickly search popular websites using text available on their webpage. Simply highlight the text you would like to search, right click, select search and then choose which website you would like results from. 

Current Supported Sites: 
- Amazon
- Twitter
- Ebay
-Youtube
-DuckDuckGo

Please help me out and leave any feedback you have on this extension. 

Thanks for checking out my first extension!
